name: TrelloGetBatchRequests
description:
Retrieve up to 10 resources with a single batched request.

Use this tool to efficiently fetch up to 10 resources from Trello in a single API call by batching multiple GET requests.

parameters.name: urls_list_for_batching
parameters.description: A list of up to 10 API routes, each beginning with a forward slash. Exclude the API version number. Example: '/members/trello', '/cards/[cardId]'.

value_schema.description: A list of API routes. Maximum of 10 routes allowed. The routes should begin with a forward slash and should not include the API version number - e.g. "urls=/members/trello,/cards/[cardId]"

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the trello API.

parameters.name: urls
parameters.description: A list of API routes. Maximum of 10 routes allowed. The routes should begin with a forward slash and should not include the API version number - e.g. "urls=/members/trello,/cards/[cardId]"

value_schema.description: A list of API routes. Maximum of 10 routes allowed. The routes should begin with a forward slash and should not include the API version number - e.g. "urls=/members/trello,/cards/[cardId]"
